questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happened?

answers.answer: I remember me, the next year, I saw a beatiful girl. She speaks Italian and me French, we couldn't speak together but she didn't stop to watch to me, and me too ... I'm really tired because I know I could try something to kiss her but I didn't have the courage ... We I had to leave the aqualand, she comes and give me kiss on my cheek. I was really happy but I knew I'll never see her again. But I think to her occasionaly ! Her and her kiss ...
